mapper.insert: insert into startup_knowledge (id, userid, usertype, title, content, ifchecked, repeat, ifread) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifchecked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repeat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifread,jdbcType=INTEGER})
